browse-receipt-for-adjustment.sqlwhere-old: ReceiptHeader.receiptNumber is not null and ReceiptHeader.receiptNumber <> 'null' and ReceiptHeader.receiptStatus = '4010' and ReceiptHeader.receiptType = 'O'
browse-receipt-for-adjustment.sqlwhere: ReceiptHeader.receiptNumber is not null and ReceiptHeader.receiptNumber <> 'null' and ReceiptHeader.receiptStatus = '4010' and ReceiptHeader.receiptType = 'O' and (ReceiptHeader.owner = :as_userid or ReceiptHeader.forwardTo = :as_userid) and ReceiptHeader.refNumber in (SELECT distinct PoHeader.poNumber FROM PoHeader as PoHeader, PoLine as PoLine WHERE PoHeader.icPoHeader = PoLine.icPoHeader and PoLine.status >= '3030' and PoLine.status <= '4010' and PoLine.status <> '3045' and ((PoLine.receiptRequired = 'E' and (PoLine.requisitionerCode = :as_userid or ((PoLine.requisitionerCode is null or PoLine.requisitionerCode = '') and (PoHeader.requisitionerCode = :as_userid or PoHeader.buyerCode = :as_userid)))) or PoLine.receiptRequired = 'R') )
browse-receipt-for-adjustment.title: Receipts Available for Adjustments
